name: Meydan Racecourse
snippet: Meydan Racecourse is a racecourse in Dubai , United Arab Emirates . The grandstand is a half mile in length, and can accommodate over 60,000 spectators.

name: Meydan Racecourse | Musco Lighting Europe LTD
snippet: Dubai Racing Club's Meydan Racecourse is the world's largest integrated horseracing facility, featuring a 1,750 m dirt surface and a 2,400 m turf course.

name: Meydan race course construction on track - Dubai
snippet: Jul 22, 2019 — Meydan racecourse opens doors to media to offer a tour of what the future of UAE horse racing will look like.
